report.title: Passionless Flower
report.author: Boy George
report.bodytext: Hello, I was looking through the net bumming for some kind of mind altering substance I might have easy access to. I noticed passionflower and decided to try it. It's been my experience that it takes a lot less to get you off on a substance when you smoke it as opposed to eating it. I decided to take some dried passion flower and smoke it. /n /n I packed a bowl and sat around puffing it. It burned easily and went down pretty easily so my puffing method was similar to that on a cigar. Within 2 minutes after the intake I could feel some sort of change. The change was very mild and subtle, but there. I felt more tranquil, slowed down and content. There was a pleasant body feel but it lacked the euphoria I was looking for. My suggestion is this might be a good thing to smoke before bed, or to calm the nerves.
